verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Utuhurumie,
ee Bwana, ee Bwana, ee Bwana.
Tuhurumie,
ee Bwana, ee Bwana, ee Bwana.
Bwana utuhurumie.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Utuhurumie,
ee Kristu, ee Kristu, ee Kristu.
Tuhurumie,
ee Kristu, ee Kristu, ee Kristu.
Kristu utuhurumie.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Utuhurumie,
ee Bwana, ee Bwana, ee Bwana.
Tuhurumie,
ee Bwana, ee Bwana, ee Bwana.
Bwana utuhurumie.
